attributes.action: review how GPs diagnose stress at work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employees can take advantage of the system by simply saying whatever they like to their GP.  A GP can then diagnose Depression in the workplace without any attempt at attending the workplace.  Think of the amount of tax payers money which would be saved if people did not make bogus claims of stress in the workplace.
